lead_paragraph: The pianist Maurizio Pollini celebrated the 200th anniversary of Chopin’s birth with a recital at Carnegie Hall on Thursday night.
snippet: The pianist Maurizio Pollini celebrated the 200th anniversary of Chopin’s birth with a recital at Carnegie Hall on Thursday night.

headline.main: Chopin’s Gloomy Ghosts and Haunting Winds
headline.seo: At Carnegie Hall, Maurizio Pollini Celebrates Chopin
headline.print_headline: Chopin’s Gloomy Ghosts And Haunting Winds
